description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

It is perfectly located on the Hudson River, sitting on the marina, adjacent to the recently built Westfield, Oculas Monument and Freedom Tower. 

Over 30 floors up with stunning views of the hudson and status of liberty which is sunset facing.

Overall a beautiful home to stay during your visit.

Battery Park is one of the most loved areas in New York City and perfectly located close to all major transport and subway links, making the entire city easily accessible. 

Great for shopping, sightseeing and plenty of great restaurants.
name: Beautiful apartment with water views along harbor
